content: rounds out of the yellow felt poke a little hole in the center to push the safety eye through when ready to attach them with black make an adjustable loop round 1 6 single_crochet in loop round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around - 12 scs round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 scs round 4 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 24 scs round 5 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around - 30 scs round 6 work 4 row even single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 7 *invdec or decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around - 24 single_crochet round 8 * invdec or decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 single_crochet at this point attach safety eyes to head through center of each felt round embroider eyelashes on if you want stuff the head firmly with polyfill stuffing round 9 * invdec or decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 12 single_crochet round 10 invdec or decrease around - 6 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a long tail using a needle weave the tail through front loops of the last round and pull tightly knot to secure weave in ends body with black make an adjustable loop round 1 6 single_crochet in loop round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around - 12 scs round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 scs round 4 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 24 scs round 5 work 2 row even single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 6 change to yellow * invdec or decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 single_crochet round 7 change to black work 1 row even single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 8 change to yellow work 1 row even single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 9 change to black work 2 invdec or decrease over next 4 single_crochet single_crochet in each of the next 10 single_crochet work 2 invdec or decrease over next 4 single_crochet 14 single_crochet round 10 work this row even single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 11 invdec or decrease single_crochet in each of the next 8 single_crochet invdec or decrease 12 single_crochet round 12 work this row even single_crochet in each single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a yarn-tail long enough to sew body to head wings make 2 with white make an adjustable loop round 1 6 single_crochet in loop round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around - 12 scs round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 scs fasten_off leaving a long tail to sew
